syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Chemistry 9701

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Relative masses of atoms and molecules

learning_objectives.description: define the unified atomic mass unit as one twelfth of the mass of a carbon-12 atom
define relative atomic mass, Ar, relative isotopic mass, relative molecular mass, Mr, and relative formula mass in terms of the unified atomic mass unit
